entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
